m.marble-sense: רשׁע:002003003012:Guilty:to declare guilty;to condemn as guilty
בושׁ:002001002026:Shame:to put to shame;to bring shame
ארב:002002001007:Hide:to lie in wait;to lay an ambush;to lurk
אַיִן:002002002006:Non-Exist;002002003004:Non-Happen:there is no;there is not;it is not;it does not
קלה:002001002016:Insignificant;002001002026:Shame;002001002005:Despise:to be of low esteem;to be held in contempt;to be degraded;to be humiliated
כבד:002001001029:Heavy>002001002013:Great:to put on airs;to play the important man
עבד:002003002024:Serve>002002001011:Plant:to work;to till;to plow (soil, flax);to dress (a vineyard)
שׂבע:002001001024:Ingest>002003003009:Engage:to be satisfied (with something);to have one's fill (of something)
שׁוב:002002003003:Happen>002003002006:Chastise:to be repaid;to be paid back;to be punished
עשׂה:002002002005:Exist>002003003009:Engage:to do;to perform;to commit;to practice;to observe;to celebrate;to keep
